name: emit
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 to send out a beam, noise, smell, or gas: The alarm emits infrared rays which are used to detect any intruder. The machine emits a high-pitched sound when you press the button.

to send out light, sound, or a smell, or a gas or other substance: The alarm emits a high-pitched sound if anyone tries to break in. emission noun [ C/U ] us
